column4: Question: I've heard that in Edgy they turned off the whole auto fsck after x mounts.  I upgraded from Dapper, and they've always pissed me off. Should I disable it? Where in fstab do I?
at the end of the fstab line there are 2 numbers, one of those says to check or not
set the last number in fstab to 0 if you dont want fsck to run
if it has any other number it will get checked
